comment: She does not teach at a 2000 level, more like 4000 or even graduate level.  The quizzes are insanely difficult. She will say that something will be on a quiz and then it won't be so it is difficult to even know what to study. Quizzes can be 5-10 questions and cover a ton of material, this increases the difficulty.

BEWARE!Her qiuzzes are like tests. All questions are short answer. Class is out of 100 points with the only test counting for 30 points.She grades hard on everything.She teaches as if its a grad class.Class stated with 25 students and ended with 12 student. That alone should let you know how terrible her class will be.

Warning, her class is tough, she teaches it as a graduate class. You have 5 quizes a paper and a final, and each quiz is a letter grade.  The quizes are short answer to essay, and are extremely hard, she doesn't believe in m/c.  The quizes will make or break your grade, my only suggestion is to find another teacher, half of my class has dropped!
